I just talked to Jen over IM, so her chars are hers again, whenever 
she decides to post.

::Prowl::

Prowl nods, watching Iron Raptor walk off toward the CF. For a second 
he was lost in her beauty, his spark beating with his love for her. 
But after she walked through the CF's hatch and it closed behind her, 
Prowl's mind slowly got back on track, focusing on the orders.

"Epyon," he says into his comm, "Iron Raptor wants to know if you 
could meet her at the CF's control room right now."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Iron Raptor closes in on the CF after walking for a bit with 
Prowl in her 
> arms, nodding before and watching Fliq scurry off towards the cr 
chambers a 
> while ago.
> But she stops once Prowl lifts his weight from her shoulders, 
reluctantly 
> letting go of him as he receives a transmission from Epyon.
> She missed how close they use to be and feeling his against her, 
even though 
> he had been weak, had made her feel good. Just to be close like 
that.
> < Any time. >
> She continues quietly towards the CF doors, leaving Prowl to take 
care of 
> whatever business he had with Epyon before she received the 
thoughts from 
> Prowl just before reaching the doors.
> So, two members of his crew were missing, and he was starting to 
make plans 
> to dismantle his ship. It must be for that idea that Prowl had 
before after 
> the first battle that they got back from.
> < I'll take care of it. >
> Iron Raptor looked over her shoulder at Mantle and his crew. *
> 
> " Mantle, please select 3 members of your crew and prep them for 
possible 
> departure."
> 
> * She then turned to face the doors of the CF again and passed 
through them 
> as they opened for her.
> < Prowl, contact Epyon and tell him to join me here in the control 
room. I 
> want to understand what's going on before I send any of my soldiers 
out. > ( 
> she doesn't know Epyon's busy helping angel prime.)
> Iron Raptor opened a com channel to Histeria. *
> 
> " Histeria, I need a Maximal wide announcement for all of the 
faction to 
> either remain or return to base.  There's going to be a few things 
going on 
> here and it involves everyone."
> 
> * And from there Iron Raptor disappeared into the shadows of the 
> Cybertronian Fire, her bulky armor making a siolette against the 
light of 
> distant rooms. A figure which was not to be reckoned with. *
> 
> 
>
